User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: ChatZilla 0.9.86.1-rdmsoft [XULRunner 1.9.2.13/20101203074205]

When color codes are used outside of normal channel or user messages, cZ does not properly close them. For example, if someone uses a color code in their realname message and they are included in a /WHO output, then the color code will "leach" into the rest of that particular line. The same also applies for any invalid commands or names using a color code.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch ChatZilla.
2. Attempt to perform /%Cxx,yyTEST in any tab.
2a. Replace xx and yy with a foreground and background color that's different from your current motif.
3. Observe the output.

Actual Results:  
The color code leached out of the quotes and into the rest of the "invalid command" message.

Expected Results:  
The color code should be contained inside of the respective area.

The right quote isn't getting affected by the color code.
comments.author: hmmwhatsthisdo@gmail.com
